articles.title: Sikander Raza breaks Rohit Sharma's legendary record with POTM performance vs Sri Lanka
articles.description: Zimbabwe finished top of the group after beating Sri Lanka, with Raza earning Player of the Match. At 39, he broke Rohit Sharma's record for the oldest captain to win a POTM in an ICC event and strengthened Zimbabwe's momentum heading into the Super Eights.

articles.title: ‘Everybody loves an underdog story’ - The 2026 T20 World Cup is all about Zimbabwe

articles.title: T20 World Cup Points Table Day 13: West Indies Stay Perfect, Zimbabwe Send Warning Ahead Of Super Eights
articles.description: West Indies stayed unbeaten to enter the Super Eights, while Zimbabwe shocked Sri Lanka to top Group B.
